panels.visual: Visual: Lightsword stands firm, all three companions at their side - Darkstorm growling, Pip screeching, Starwind rearing. THREE cards glow in Lightsword's hands. Characters: Lightsword, Darkstorm, Pip, Starwind
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "One chance. Three cards. Everything on the line."

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.
characters.LightswordGlowing: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light. No defined species yet - ethereal and mysterious. Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form. Eyes are bright points of warm light. The light pulses gently with emotions.
characters.Darkstorm: An enormous wolf the size of a horse, with thick silver-grey fur. Once cursed and in pain, now healed and loyal. Intelligent amber eyes show gratitude and devotion. Follows at respectful distance, ready to protect. Named Darkstorm after being freed from shadow chains.
characters.Pip: A cat-sized dragon with reddish-brown scales and iridescent bat-like wings. Large expressive eyes full of intelligence and emotion. Found injured in the maze, becomes a loyal companion when shown kindness. Communicates through emotion rather than words.
characters.Starwind: A magnificent winged horse with a pure white coat and feathered wings spanning 20 feet. Noble and intelligent, with silver hooves and a flowing mane. Freed from shadow chains and eternally grateful, offering to carry the hero.

panels.visual: Visual: TURN UNDEAD - HOLY LIGHT EXPLOSION! The Shadow Sorcerer STAGGERS back, form burning with golden fire! TELEKINESIS - the shadow chains around Spore SHATTER! PRECISE SHOT - an arrow of pure light pierces the Sorcerer's chest! Characters: Lightsword, Shadow Sorcerer (struck), Spore (freed)

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.
characters.LightswordGlowing: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light. No defined species yet - ethereal and mysterious. Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form. Eyes are bright points of warm light. The light pulses gently with emotions.
characters.Spore: A small mushroom creature about knee-height. Pale cap with bioluminescent spots that glow soft blue. Big, expressive dark eyes. Releases colored spores based on emotion - gray when scared or sad, rainbow when joyful. Lightsword's best friend from the underground village.
characters.ShadowSorcerer: A hooded figure in tattered dark robes - once a Choosing candidate who failed and died in bitterness centuries ago. Face is a hollow mask of who they once were. Purple eyes burning with jealousy and rage. Form flickers between solid and shadow. Tragic rather than purely evil.
characters.Shadow: An incorporeal undead creature of pure darkness, vaguely humanoid silhouette with no distinguishing features except cold pinpricks of malevolent white light for eyes. Sliding along walls and floor, reaching with grasping shadow hands toward the trapped pegasus.

panels.visual: Visual: Spore leaps free from the altar, running toward Lightsword. Rainbow spores of JOY burst from the myconid! Characters: Spore, Lightsword

panels.visual: Visual: The Shadow Sorcerer's form fades - the shadows dissolving to reveal the SAD, LONELY person they once were. A young face, eyes no longer burning but full of regret. Characters: Shadow Sorcerer (fading)
panels.dialogue: Shadow Sorcerer: "Maybe that's what I was missing. Not power. Just... someone who cared." (Caption): "The specter faded. The darkness lifted."

characters.ShadowSorcererFading: The Shadow Sorcerer after being struck by Lightsword's three-card attack. Form dissolving, shadows fading. The rage draining away to reveal the sad, lonely person they once were - a young face, regretful eyes. Finding a moment of peace before fading completely.
characters.Shadow: An incorporeal undead creature of pure darkness, vaguely humanoid silhouette with no distinguishing features except cold pinpricks of malevolent white light for eyes. Sliding along walls and floor, reaching with grasping shadow hands toward the trapped pegasus.
